body_html:
Agreed all comments.

Tensorflow is a great tool but I see two bottlenecks for it to be widely used:

  1. Many clusters have the old CentOS on which TF doesn't work
  2. Many developers use MacBook Pro, and TF doesn't support GPU integration.

I hope the team considers these issues.

body:
Agreed all comments. 

Tensorflow is a great tool but I see two bottlenecks for it to be widely used:
1. Many clusters have the old CentOS on which TF doesn't work
2. Many developers use MacBook Pro, and TF doesn't support GPU integration. 

I hope the team considers these issues.
